website_summaries.verdict: A versatile rechargeable air pump that can be powered up using either an AC or DC adapter. Ideal for both at home and on-the-go use.
pros: Cordless design is especially convenient for outdoor use
Ergonomic shape makes it easy to handle
Includes 3 nozzles and both AC and DC cables for outlet or car charging
cons: No light to indicate a full charge
Like most rechargables, it can't be used while charging

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed with this rechargeable air pump. This pump is lightweight, durable and works perfect. I like that you get a wall and car charger with it. It comes with several attachments as well. This pump filled and deflated the Big Marble HD towable tube fast and it didn’t struggle at all. This is a great buy. My only complaint is this pump doesn’t have a light anywhere on it that shows it actually is charging but I can overlook that because it performs at such a high level. I HIGHLY recommend this purchase. Hit that helpful button if you find this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M

customer_reviews.title: Small, light weight, powerful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this air pump to replace my battery powered one that came with my air mattress. This pump is much more powerful than my previous pump, lighter/smaller in size, and is rechargeable so I don't have to worry about replacing the batteries every time I need to use it. It filled up my queen size air mattress in about 1 minute. I don't know how many times I could fill the air mattress before it needs to be recharged, but I certainly had no issues filling one air bed. The largest size nozzle fit in the air bed perfectly. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Somebody had borrowed my pump and never returned it a few years ago. This is the first time I've needed one in a while. So, I decided to get something like the one I had before. Boy was I surprised to find that I could get battery power to fill more than one air mattress and not be deafened by the noise. It was awesome. Very quick to fill and very acceptable noise level. And cheap on top of all that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable & works well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pump so we could use it with our new inflatable kayaks purchased as extras for our family. Even though the inflatable kayaks came with their own hand pumps that worked wonderfully, we figured this would save us from becoming fatigued before even getting in the water with the kayaks. It worked great and didn't take too long to fill the kayaks. Wasn't all that noisy either.
customer_reviews.author: Drindi

customer_reviews.title: Works great. One Con but Can't Dock It
customer_reviews.text: I iught inflatable kayaks to save space at home and make transport easier. They came with manual air pumps but I ordered this at the same time. So glad I did. I tried inflating them manually, and it took a lot of effort. Then I tried this and it took about 5 minutes to inflate all three. Con: it does not operate while plugged in. It only charges. The charge was sufficient enough to I flare and deflate 3 big kayaks, so I can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: JFK IITop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Super fast & efficient
customer_reviews.text: This pump was such a great find. Charged it for a few hours before using it first and I was able to fill over 10 single river tubes, 2 double river tubes and 3 inflatable coolers. The pump was still charged after.
customer_reviews.author: KAYLA ROSARIO

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine, Charges quickly, and i really like that it comes with a car charger and a home charger. I've only charged it once and I think I've used it four times over the past week. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lex O'Flex

customer_reviews.title: Inefficient tool
customer_reviews.text: Took nearly 15 minutes to inflate an inner tube: a very long time given the size of the flotation toy. Planned to return the pump after that single use, but missed the return window. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful.
customer_reviews.text: It would only blow the exercise ball up so far. I had to use the pump that came with the ball to completely inflate it. It might be ok for an air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: One and done
customer_reviews.text: I used this to blow up 1 inflatable pool toy. The next time I went to use it, it would not work. I charged it up and still nothing. Of coarse this is one day after the return window closed. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile to inflate
customer_reviews.text: It took 7 minutes to inflate a swimming pool intertube. You're not supposed to use for more than 10 minutes at a time so I'll update my review once I inflate my other items.
customer_reviews.author: MoneySpender

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I used the air pump once for a kiddie pool and it worked great! I had all the tips I needed and was much more powerful than I expected for a small pump. Shortly after blowing it up, we got a heavy storm and my silly self left it out in the rain. I contacted OlarHike and they were super helpful and offered me more than I expected since I used it only once. Very happy with the product and the company, will buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CONVENIENT ON THE TRAIL WHEREVER YOU GO!
customer_reviews.text: Once got it, didn't take long to completely charge. Has a small red "pin" that plugs into the back to prevent unwanted off/on when not using. I poked a small hole in this safety plug and attached permanently to the handle. so as not to lose it. I Inflated 2 air mattresses quite quickly. Liked that you could also charge from your vehicle. Inflating end not so convenient as inflator at 90 Degrees when using, Lifetime warranty is generous. Finally price was definitely reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: ARLMAR

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product pumped my pool up one time perfectly fine and efficiently. Then, a month later, after charging it again, it no longer works. Basically I took a $20 bill (plus some!) and lit it on fire. I’ll be purchasing another pump from a WAY more reliable company. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice pump
customer_reviews.text: This pump is easy to use and very efficient. Like that it has multiple different adapters that can be multipurpose. Also comes with a part so you can use your cigarette lighter when out camping. I tried on water mattress and the adapter fit well and inflate it quickly
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gore

customer_reviews.title: Hollow piece of plastic for the garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute POS. It felt cheap out of the box but I tried it anyway. Plugged it in to charge for several hours prior to use as instructions stated, but it never did a thing. Complete waste of money. It’s almost as though I was shipped nothing but a hollow shaped piece of plastic. And unfortunately I didn’t need to use it until after my return window ended, so to the garbage it is.
customer_reviews.author: Malia Elise

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This device is super easy to use and set up. Also, our air mattress was inflated in no time comparing to the old pump we had. It already comes pre charged, which is awesome because the same day we received it we left to camp, our mattress was inflated and kept the air fo the 3 nights. I recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY-- CHEAP AND A WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, which fell apart immediately, this thing never worked. Didn't even turn on. It even feels cheap and even if it did work I doubt it's ability to blow up anything. Save yourself the trouble of returning it and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Livy

customer_reviews.title: Fizzle
customer_reviews.text: This pump was one of most expensive ones on site. For the money paid, it did not perform as such. Was obnoxiously loud and had other beach goers giving me the “look” while i used it. It also does not pump up rafts to any real pressure. One cavity of item is filled it just stalls out. I ended up having to fill the remainder up by mouth. Sorry but i expect more for $29
customer_reviews.author: YKNOTR

customer_reviews.title: Nozzles dont fit correctly
customer_reviews.text: Works great however the nozzles dont fit on the blower correctly so you have to fight it. I was able to get it to work both for inflation and deflation...but...its a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H Beining

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works quickly. Glad it had wall charger and car charger options. However I used it for the 1st time in Sept after purchasing in Jan. After it pumped up two full air mattresses, it was dead. Have attempted to charge with wall charger and car charger but nothing has worked. Reached out to the seller to get an exchange and unfortunately the product is out of stock. Product does come with a 2 year warranty so a refund is being processed. I definitely appreciate the seller being on top of it!
customer_reviews.author: Alita Hawksworth

customer_reviews.title: You need to know
customer_reviews.text: LOL, that it doesn't work while plugged in! You have to unplug it from the charging source before the thing will work! We thought it was broken!!! My friend slept on the floor because we thought the air pump didn't work since we tried to use it plugged into the wall, I dreamt that we needed to unplug it, and tried it with it unplugged the following morning to find it will not work when plugged in, but works great when fully charged and unplugged!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Saves a lot of work
customer_reviews.text: Saves a lot of work at camp. Before, five minutes of hard hand pumping( I'm an old fart), now plug into the air mattress and one minute later a bed. Will not pressurize the mattress, if you like a firmer mattress it will require a few strokes with a hand pump. I have blown up seven twin size air mattresses with no notice of reduced efficiency. It takes about two hours to fully charge, so when I leave for camp(2.5hrs), I plug into my power port and it is fully charged when I arrive. As with most rechargeable batteries it is best to discharge and recharge a couple times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Leedom

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: The pump is much smaller than i expected but inflated our twin mattress very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BDR

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for size
customer_reviews.text: Really puts out the air. Lightweight. Makes filling my camping air mattress a snap. My only complaint is that there isn't a charging light, so you just have to charge until you think it's enough. Instructions say charge at least 5 hours before using the first time. I charged around 4 hours and it works fine. It will not operate when charging with the 110 adapter. You have to take it off charge to activate. "O" means Off. "--" means On.
customer_reviews.author: James Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to blow up my 75 in inflatable Ride On swan in less than 20 minutes! Sounds like a lot but it definitely works.
customer_reviews.author: Keiry

customer_reviews.title: Subject to overcharging. No indicator light when battery is fully charged.
customer_reviews.text: The pump came as described, but it is subject to overcharging (especially after fully charged and then used, but not fully drained) as it has no indicator light to determine when charging is complete. Battery simply gets very hot if left plugged in for charging too long, which can really shorten a battery's life. Otherwise, it has a seemingly decent airflow one can depend on, and adaptors fit well.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 2 days
customer_reviews.text: This worked great but only for 2 days. Bought it to take on a beach vacation but after two days it wouln't turn on. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Kay Warren

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Used with a 8' 3" folding transom RIB, although it could easily support up to maybe a 10ft RIB. It works GREAT! With one person working the foot pump while the other works the electric pump, both inflation and deflation takes just a few minutes. I am shocked it's this good for the price. I'm considering getting another just to make the process even faster. Why spend $100+ on a "real" inflator when you can buy a boatload of these for the same amount?
customer_reviews.author: Cape Dory SailorTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Weak pump
customer_reviews.text: This pump is only good for inflatable toys. If you need to pump up a boat or air mattress, you'll need something else.
customer_reviews.author: Drey

customer_reviews.title: Item would not turn on
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in one piece and looked fine but would not work even after charging for several hours. I do not know if the seller would have taken the return as I did not test the product until after the returnable date.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: We have uses this for a camp mattress as well as vacuum storage bags. We have no worked through a full charge yet even over a 3 day camp trip with a couple of mattresses. Mind the little red plug that goes in the power port. If that plug is in the device will not turn on. This is handy, it will not accidentally turn on in the trunk while travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Perry

customer_reviews.title: great pump
customer_reviews.text: portable and relatively fast, saves a lot of hassle. battery is plenty strong but the charger isn't very smart, aren't supposed to just leave it on the charger when not in use. for the price that is fine by me
customer_reviews.author: wootaholic

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: we charged this for over 48 hours and then tested it, and it worked. 24 hours later it had no charge left in it. very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: jamie simmons

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I thought, but the compact size allows me to put it in my tote with 2 tubes and a cooler tube. I charged it over night and filled 3 tubes to test them and then turned it around to deflate them. No speed demon but it got the job done a lot better than blowing in the tube. No loss of power for the process. My trip got cancelled so that is the only use I have gotten out of it.
customer_reviews.author: David VanderSchuur

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, light weight and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I have used inflatables for many years and this is the best inflator I have ever owned. It is much lighter and portable than the Coleman I had before and the batteries last a long time. I have never run out of battery, I have inflated my mattress at least 8 times on one charge without feeling it loosing strength. Some day I may try to use all the battery just to know how much it lasts...
customer_reviews.author: Juan Manuel Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Feature nice
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried to inflate anything yet but it appears to be very nice. I like the ways the adapters are interconnected together which will help to not loose the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Goose

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Fast and charge lasts
customer_reviews.text: Used this pump for a 10 day trip with youth and pumped up my air mattress around 8 times without recharging (still has power and going strong). Pump filled the mattress very fast. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe J

customer_reviews.title: This is useable without being plugged in
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that I am able to be sure that I can camp and not worry about keeping my air mattress full of air. 😁
customer_reviews.author: SWilson

customer_reviews.title: Good small pump.
customer_reviews.text: Great small pump that works flawlessly at first glance, it has a lot of potential as a all around pump for almost every single inflatable item in the house. For mattress it worked like a charm. For iSUP paddle boards it has its flaws, unfortunately it doesnt take the paddle to more than 5 PSi, which is a shame cause that was the main reason for my purchase. The charger works great on wall or car, but ut doesnt tell you with a light or something that is fully charged, or out of batteries. That wud have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander B.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Handy & Easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: Only one thing make it distinct from any other Air pump that it works on rechargeable battery. So you can take it with you any place and you not worry about having AC or DC connection. It works with both AC & DC power connection. Both connectors comes in box. I only used AC connection till now to charge it. If inflate my baby water pool in 7-8 mins which is the same time it take direct plugged AC pump.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have much in the way of expectations for this pump. I would have been satisfied if it made it through one cycle of inflating and deflating my air mattress on a recent Cub Scout camping trip. Well, it not only handled my mattress but also 5 other ones after the other parents borrowed it and seemed to still have power to spare. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: FTNuke

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this item because it can operate ONLY on battery power, not while plugged in. It turns out it had enough guts to fully inflate my 10 foot Intex Mariner 4 raft with 4 big compartments, plus the seats. I still wish I could find a 12 volt pump that would run while plugged into the cigarette lighter, but if the battery on this continues to perform so well, it is a great solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I used this pump for a couple of months and it worked great, (though quite loud). I pit it away for the winter and when I went back use it in spring it does not hold a charge at all. It will blow for maybe one second then die. It was stored in my closet away from extreme temperatures or moisture. Cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christeen E. Buck

customer_reviews.title: More powerful than plug-in pumps
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars if it worked while plugged in. When you have it plugged in to an outlet or your car lighter it will not switch on. It is much more powerful than my friend's plug in model which takes forever to inflate anything.
customer_reviews.author: MC5150 in AK

customer_reviews.title: Great for air mattresses
customer_reviews.text: Filled 3 premium air mattresses (the taller ones) pretty fast and still had a charge. It's loud but works quickly. My only gripe is the lack of a fully charged light when charging.
customer_reviews.author: Morphes

customer_reviews.title: Charge for 5 hours before using
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, portable and cordless when charged. The downgrade from 5 to 4 stars is because I don't see a way to get replacement batteries for when the supplied batteries wear out which makes the pump disposible . If I am incorrect, I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Enteranet

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work while charging
customer_reviews.text: It leads you to believe that it would work while charging, but it doesn't. Other pumps that work while charging are much more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Lightweight and portable. I like that it comes with both a wall charger or car charger. I also like that it can inflate and deflate. My only recommendation would be to add a nozzle that has a narrow but flat tip for deflation.
customer_reviews.author: NMAG2005

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even blow up a small inflatable pool toy. I’m not sure what it would actually work on.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small pump for pool and inflatables
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned when it arrived because it seemed smaller and more flimsy than what I expected. After a quick charge i tried it out and it did the trick without issue. I am very happy with this little pump. Portable and strong enough to fill my big inflatable pool!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to use and handy and well worth what I spent. The only reason I did 4 stars instead of 5 is that I still have to hand pump just a little at the end for my kayak to be as full as I want it - if I just use the electric the kayak still has some give.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Portable air pump
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Filled my queen size mattress in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: RobW

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to inflate and deflate a kayak, because another review said it worked well. It definitely doesn't have enough power to inflate a kayak. I had to finish inflating it with someone else's blower. You get what you pay for. I'm returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Possible

customer_reviews.title: Handy Inflator and Deflator!
customer_reviews.text: Only used this once at the lake but gotta say I love it so far! Easy to use, managed to blow up a mattress and a watermelon floaty, I don't have experience with any other pumps so not sure if this was slower/faster than most. But it did the job! The deflator was slow... so we mostly pushed air out, and then used this to get out the extra bit of air thats hard to get out. Extra bonus you can charge this at home or in the car, comes with both adapters! So no batteries to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tina T

customer_reviews.title: Used it camping
customer_reviews.text: I just got the inflatable pump. I immediately charged the rechargeable battery and pumped up three queen air mattresses on the same charge. I love the versatility of 12 volt, plug in or battery powered. I imagine it will get quite a bit of use around the pool with inflatables.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good charge!
customer_reviews.text: We've used it on a two night camp trip with a problematic air mattress. One full charge provided one full and three patial fill ups and also air removal at the end. That's pretty great for a small lightweight pump!
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Renz

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, light weight, rechargeable battery. Am able to fill up 4+ river tubes in minutes. Car charger and home charger included.
customer_reviews.author: Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Charge for Hours Before Use!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I got this after buying an inferior product—what an improvement. It blew up a very large, inflatable kiddie pool in minutes. However, beware that it needs to charge for HOURS before use.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Balboa

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little pump!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the strongest rechargeable battery power air pump I Have ever had. Follow the instruction- don’t let it get too hot. I was able to fill a kiddie pool, and then all the inflatable toys. It still was ready to go. I charge it after every big use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have a 1.5 mile walk to the beach and BIG floats. We tossed this in our tote bag and took it with us to inflate and deflate the floats...perfect!! So much easier than trying to walk with inflated floats on a windy day!
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Powerful punch in a small container.
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 of these camping for a week with large family. Blew up my queen mattress every day, multi borrows for beach blow ups and other mattresses and only recharged one once but neither died, one just slowed a little. I had my doubts because of the small size... now my kids insist I put this on their Xmas list. I’ve had others, bigger bulkier and had to recharge every other day, same camping trip every year. Very happy with my purchase and will buy more for Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a very good powerful cordless pump
customer_reviews.text: I have used it a couple times on a camping trip to fill up and deflate two twin sized air mattresses, seemed to inflate and deflate them very quickly on the same charge.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and cordless
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome..inflated my Queen intex couch bed decently quick! Deflation took longer just cuz of how the couch is made but still super stoked on it and that it’s cordless and the charge lasts for a long time..idk how long but it hasn’t died on me yet lol
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Z

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: First impression: It's more compact than Coleman's inflator and seems durable. I like the rechargeability. I don't know how long it will hold a charge-- say for a 3-night camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: witz

customer_reviews.title: Air Pump for the Win!
customer_reviews.text: This pump was a win for our camping trip! It's lightweight and super easy to use. Inflate/deflate on our air mattresses was shockingly fast. We generally don't camp more than once a year, so we'll set reminders to recharge the batteries in 6 months per the directions. We are VERY pleased with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: gator mommy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Easy to Handle
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this Electric Air Pump! We had many blow-ups to inflate for a children's event and we had them all blown up within 20 minutes. For it's size and price, you get a lot for your buck!!! Very handy and saves your lungs from manual inflation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping to blow up a double flocked queen air mattress. VERY pleased with it's performance, blew the giant thing up in just a few minutes, still had juice to blow up two more smaller air mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra James

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Used it to blow up an inflatable pool. Used it about 4x more to add air to the pool when needed. Tried to use it yesterday, completely stopped working. Tried to charge it all night, no luck--- dead. Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Plug it in to charge, pray it charged, then use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a quick way to inflate tubes for a party of 10+ people. It worked perfectly for inflating everything from pool tubes to double River tubes. Something to know is that the pump didn't seem to work when it's charging and there's no light to tell you it's charging. (hence my 4 star rating for ease of use) My friends were impressed enough by this tiny thing they're thinking about getting one of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use and very powerful. Will blow up anything from floats to king size air mattress within minutes! Not sure how long the battery lasts, because mine got “stolen” by some family members.
customer_reviews.author: Aivaras

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use pump.
customer_reviews.text: Pump was easy to use and smaller in size than my old pump which was nice in being able to pack in my camping gear. It stayed charged and never lost power in using it every day over 5 day camping trip. Hopefully it will last a couple years. It would be nice if they would make these pumps with replacable battery packs like you find with hand tools.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: It packs a powerful punch for such a compact pump...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump to use on a king size air mattress we use in our tent... I have used many other types of pumps before, but this one is by far the best... I have been amazed at how well it holds a charge as well as how quick it inflates a large air mattress... We have been very pleased with this little guy and believe me, you will be hard pressed to find a better one... Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Great electric pump!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight, convenient pump. We use ours for our air mattresses. So nice and portable. You can depend on this unit & have no worries when setting up camp. Fills quickly. Arrived before it was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosker

customer_reviews.title: Solid pump
customer_reviews.text: Strong pump. Can't comment on battery life because I've charged it before camping/beach trips, but I've yet to see it lose power. Good purchase, definitely beats having to plug a pump into a power supply.
customer_reviews.author: ribbon mike

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product, never worked. Missed window to return. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pump to inflate air mattresses anticipating family dtaying over during the holidays. Unfortunately we didn't try to use it until after the "return window closed", otherwise I absolutely have would have returned this product. It came boxed and shipped fine, and appeared to be all in one piece with all parts. But no matter what we tried, we could not get it to work. It's completely useless. Not sure if it's a bad design or we got a lemon... Would definitely not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ALC

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy little pump that is small enough to handle easily yet powerful enough to quickly inflate my twin mattress, inflatable foot stools, and different toys. This was a solid purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: LuvGr8Gizmos

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to fill an inflatable boat at water side. It is small, lightweight, the battery last a long time on a charge and it puts out a lot of air. It fills an 11' boat in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Vossen

customer_reviews.title: Functional but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad while it worked. Not water resistant though; we got hit by a Florida rainshower and it was off and never turned back on after being dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Ken P

customer_reviews.title: Good little pump.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little pump. It can get about 7 mattresses before seeing any decline.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Portable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability of it and not having to use an extension cord to blow up the pool. Its rechargeable with two ways to charge. It inflates n deflates.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use! Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump because I bought several large pool floats that I didn't have the time or energy to blow up by mouth or with a hand pump. This blew them up quickly AND helped me to get them down quickly to put them away after the season. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love that it can work by plugging into wall outlet or car/boat charging port. The best part is the rechargeable battery, so it doesn't need to plugged in to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mcdevitt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The connection points are no short to attach hose well. The pressure output is terrible. It could not put 2 psi in my inflatable boat.
customer_reviews.author: Tansey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a last minute camping trip. Fast delivery. Easy to use. Inflated and deflated my air mattress without needing recharged in between.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cash

customer_reviews.title: Air pump
customer_reviews.text: I received my order one day early. Was able to pump up river tube to try it out, for a 53" tube....it inflated very quickly. Able to deflate just as quick. Would buy again most likely
customer_reviews.author: SamZ

customer_reviews.title: Charge it first to get the best out of it.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed how fast this little thing inflates. Used it on a recent camping trip and am simply blown away how fast I was able to inflate the air mattress we slept on... important to note... upon recieving ther 3 pump, charge it fully as per the instructions. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: dalia danciu

customer_reviews.title: Fast pump
customer_reviews.text: Pump worked just as described. It filled. my 18 inch high air mattress in 6.5 minutes. I only tested at home but plan to take camping as well. Batteries were also already charged upon arrival. Great pump!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Great little blower
customer_reviews.text: Great little blower for inflating large tubes. And rafts. Holds charge for a long time. Comes with 110v and 12v car plug. 3 nozzle tips
customer_reviews.author: kimberly / Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for our huge pool raft that we can't get in the car so this was a necessary purchase! Takes maybe 30 seconds to blow up the whole thing!
customer_reviews.author: TechMom

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money and easy to use, the only issue I have with it is that you have to charge it for five full hours before using it.
customer_reviews.author: airforce

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to blow up at least 10 dinosaur balloon and a giant t-rex floaty! Worked fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I am always in need of an inflator. This device is an absolute life saver when we are out by the pool,camping,and boating! Would defiantly buy it if you need a portable one!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my trip to the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recent family trip to the beach and it was perfect for inflating all my kids' toys. I love how small it is. Flow rate is not like you'd get from a compressor, but an extra minute to inflate something is well worth the ease of packing this. Note that it does have to be charged ahead of time, so I'll have to remember to plug it in before my next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: PHILIP S.

customer_reviews.title: Battery operated amazing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I love that it’s portaband I don’t have to plug it in to inflate anything. Works great and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth V.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my camping trips love that I can charge it at home or in my car and it's rechargeable great price for all the parts that come included
customer_reviews.author: scorpio_1323

customer_reviews.title: Came missing charger
customer_reviews.text: Bought and placed with mattress to use for guests later. 5 months later I go to use and there’s NO home charger! Just the car charger! Totally wish u would have checked when I bought it. ALWAYS CHECK YOUR BOX!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great little pump!
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts forever, super easy to use, store, and transport. Comes with a ton of adapters and you can plug it into your car charger if the battery is dead! Not strong enough to blow up a paddle board to capacity, but it'll get you halfway there! what can you expect at this price! Great for tubes and rafts; save your lungs and arms!
customer_reviews.author: ehmsoleil

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little machine!
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight as advertised. Powerful enough to inflate my queen double air mattress. I have not tested it to its limits yet but, I suspect it will get the job done. Overall I believe it is a good investment of funds.
customer_reviews.author: Broderick Drew Jr

customer_reviews.title: Porta Pump !
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient ! I like that it is portable, light weight, and works very fast. It holds s great charge as well. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

product_meta.title: OlarHike Portable Quick-Fill Electric Air Mattress Pump for Pool Floats, Rechargeable Inflator Deflator with 110V AC & 12V DC Adapter, Black
product_meta.description: Lifetime - 100% Satisfaction OlarHike provides customers a friendly lifetime . Your satisfaction is our highest priority, and we aim to provide you with the best after-sale support & services which will not restricted by time. We stand behind our AIR PUMP and we will always focus on producing quality products for your satisfaction! For any reason you don't like it, just send them back and we'll promptly refund you in full or resolve any issue you may have. Our professional after-sales team will solve the issues immediately if you have any doubts about your order! Note： 1. DO NOT use this air pump for inflating high pressure products, such as tires, basketballs, or balloons 2. DO NOT use electric air mattress pumps continuously for more than 15 minutes 3. DO NOT drop the air pump into water. Specifications: ※ Color: black ※ Voltage Range: AC 110V / DC 12V ※ Power: 40W ※ Battery: 1000mAH ※ AC Charging Time: 5 hours ※ DC Charging Time: 2 hours ※ Using Time: 30 minutes ※ Item Weight: 1. 5 lbs. ※ Shipping Weight: 2 lbs. Package Lists: 1 x rechargeable air pump 1 x DC adapter 1 x AC adapter 1 x user manual 3 x nozzle Tired of poor product and disappointing service? Choose OlarHike! Get a Lifetime After-sales Service ! So, what are you waiting for??? Click ☛ Add to Cart ☚ and Buy Now！
feature_bullets: 【2 in 1 for Inflation & Deflation】 This quick fill air pump can easily inflate your inflatable pool accessories, toys, vacuum bags, camping air mattress, and other inflatable items. Instead of having to squeeze all the air out yourself, move the nozzle to

【For Various Sizes of Inflatables】 The lightweight air pump includes 3 sizes of nozzles for different objects. 0. 27"/0. 35"/0. 69" nozzles will fit many uses: children's safety flotation devices, beach balls, exercise balls.

【Rechargeable & Cordless】 AC and DC adapters included. It can be charged indoors using an AC wall outlet while the air pump can be also charged outdoors using a DC cigarette plug. A rechargeable battery in addition to cordless operation allows you to pack

【Quiet & Easy Operation】 A portable handle design makes inflation/deflation easier compared with other manual handy pumps. NI-MH batteries in this rechargeable pump create less pollution and offer higher performance and longer battery life.
【Support】If our products have any problems, our 24 hours supporting team can help you. If we cannot solve your problems, you can Contact Amazon Customer Support to replace them for free.
